original_text: For this is why I wrote, that I might test you and know whether you are obedient in everything.
korean_text: 너희가 범사에 순종하는지 그 증거를 알고자 하여 내가 이것을 너희에게 썼노라

sentences.original_text: For this is why I wrote,
and know whether you are obedient in everything.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 모든 일에 순종하는지 알아보려 함입니다.
